CV 
Name 
Nguyễn Văn Thiện 
Photo 
Current Position  
Software Delivery Manager 
Current Roles 
Software Delivery Manager; Line Manager; Senior Project Manager  
Current Company 
Robert Bosch 
Overview 
Personal Information: 
Name: Nguyễn Văn Thiện; English Name: Paul Nguyen; Date of birth: 11 – 12 - 1981 
Gender: Male; Nationality: Vietnamese 
Email: paulnguyen1211@gmail.com ; Skype: thiennv1211  
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/paulnguyen1211 
      Linkedin : https://www.linkedin.com/in/paul-nguyen-99205636/ 
      Mobile: +84 866.981.651 
Years of Experiences: 
● More than 16 years of experience in IT software development industry. 
● 8 years of experience in management positions (Head of SD Department, Software 
Delivery Manager, Senior project manager, SCRUM master, Project leader and Line 
manager) 
● 5 years of experience in windows application development C#, VC++ .Net, VB.Net, 
Windows API and MFC 
● 5 years of experience in web application with JavaScript, ASP/ASP.NET, ASP.Net MVC, 
T-SQL with MS SQL Server, PL-SQL Oracle databases 
● 1 year of experience in functional programming with OCAML and F# .Net 
Sample app written in F#: 
http://blogs.msdn.com/dsyme/archive/2005/11/26/ChineseChess.aspx 
http://strangelights.com/blog/archive/2011/08/15/chinese-chess-an-exercise-in-
upgrading.aspx 
● 1 year of experience in development voice web application for banking company 
programming with CCXML, VXML, JavaScript on Voice Genie and Voxeo platform 
● 5 years of experience in software development for embedded systems and telecom 
products of Nortel Network, Juniper Network and Alcatel Lucent Company. 
● 5 years of experience in software development in C/C++ with Unix/GNU Linux, 
Embedded Linux OS. 
CV 
Sample developed products: http://www.tmasolutions.com/embedded.aspx 
● Advanced in English. (TOEIC 850) 
Onsite working experience: UK, US, Germany and Switzerland: 
o August 2016: worked at SCC UK company in Birmingham (UK) 
(http://www.scc.com) 
o March 2016: worked at Smarthouse company in Frankfurt (Germany) 
(http://smarthouse.de/) 
o October 2015: worked at Wide and Clue companies in Zurich (Switzerland) 
( http://www.wide.ch/ http://clue.ch/ ) 
o May 2012: worked at Fico company in Connecticut (US) 
( http://www.fico.com) 
o March 2010: worked at NashTech company in Nuremberg (Germany) 
( http://www.nashtech.com ) 
o February 2009: worked at Alcatel Lucent company in Whippany (US) 
( http://www.alcatel-lucent.com ) 
Statement: 
● Manage resources and projects size from 25 to 40 members 
● Onsite working at customer site to engage new projects and build up offshore team. 
● Build up and manage software development team, R&D team for new technologies 
(Research and Development, Recruitment, Training, Performance management) 
● Solid experiences in Fixed price, T&M and ODC projects for many big customers in the 
world such as Sustainability Victoria, Lumesse, Fico, Nortel Networks, Juniper Networks, 
Alcatel Lucent, NashTech, … 
Technical Skills 
OS 
GNU Linux, Unix, MS Windows, Embedded Linux, VxWorks, … 
Languages 
C/C++, Java, Visual Basic, C#, Assembly, TCL/EXPECT, ASP/ASP.Net, 
HTML, XML, Java Script, Unix Shell scripts. Functional languages: SML, 
OCAML, F#… 
Databases 
MS Access, MS SQL Server 2005/2008, Oracle 
Comms & 
Networks 
3G UMTS Access and Core network, Network protocol and services 
(ATM/IMA, DHCP, IPSEC, VPN, OSPF, SNMP, …),  
Packages 
MS Visual Studio 2005/20010, MS SQL Server 2005/2008, MS Office, Wind 
River VxWork, IBM Rational Clear Case, Clear Quest, Windows server 2008, 
VMWare, Subversion, TFS, Visual source safe, Eclipse, Vi, KDevelop … 
Methodologies 
& Tools 
Imperative and Functional programming, OOP and OOD, UML, … 
Process 
CMMI Level 5 (TMA Unified process, Harvey Nash process), Agile (Scrum, 
ScrumBan, KanBan) 
CV

Bachelor degree in Information Systems from University of Natural Sciences,
